name: REDO!
description: REDO! is a game about a girl trying to find another human in a dystopian world overrun by biomachines. It's a lonely and evocative game about exploring the unknown and overcoming obstacles to see what is left.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or superior Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
